original_title: DLD: En vivo desde el auditorio nacional
overview: DLD in concert, live from one of the most important venues for music in Mexico, the national auditorium, in this emotional event sound the successes that have marked his career sound, Paco, Erik and PJ will surprise the entire audience, with a show Unique full of strength and energy.
title: DLD: En vivo desde el auditorio nacional
